about_the_game:
Every year, the residents of Kale Bay hold a ceremony to remember those they lost in the Great Fire. You have a chance to give words of comfort, or to just be an ear to listen.

Each character now has a chance to gain one extra reputation point with the player.

TO PLAY:

- Simply install the DLC. The new scene will play in Act 2.

Info: The Wild Animal Sactuary


Located in Boulder, Colorado, the WAS is the world's largest carnivore sanctuary. It takes in abused or otherwise abandoned bears, great cats, wolves, and other large carnivores in an effort to rehabilitate them.
